评论概述: Love this skirt!!! Don’t hesitate to get!!
评论详情: This is such a cute skirt, true to size and is so soft and comfortable! Definitely something to add to your collection of skirts!! Wearing size small.

I've bought this in multiple colors and have enjoyed all of them. I think it's super flattering on me and can be dressed up or down for lots of purposes. It gaps a bit at my waist but other than that, it's excellent!
Wore this to a Christmas party and had so many complements!  The skirt is thick but soft and moveable!  Would look good on any height!  Highly recommend!
I’m 5’ 10” and from the pictures I thought the skirt looked longer. Material was fine and of good quality. Will be sending back unfortunately
Skirt is adorable. No stretch and I would recommend sizing up one size

Ordered for my work Holiday party.  Love, love, love. The fabric is soft, fuzzy and warm. It does not however stretch at all, which is fine by me.  The pattern I picked (red/tan/white/black check) is super cute. I got so many compliments.  Only gripe is that the zipper is teeny and feels sketchy.  I ordered a medium and it fit perfectly. It's exactly fingertip length on me, so def a mini fit. For reference, I'm 5'11", all limbs, 150lbs, no belly or booty.  I 100% recommend this skirt.  Might buy other patterns.

评论概述: Quality skirt for colder weather, but not quite as flattering as I’d hoped
评论详情: I’m 5’ 5”, 145 lbs, and curvy, and I almost always wear a medium or sometimes even a large, but based on reviews, I sized down and ordered a small in this skirt and I was happy with that decision. I don’t like the boxy bell-type look with short skirts, and wanted it to be fitted without being too tight and this checked most of those boxes, but still wasn’t as flattering as I’d hoped it would be from all angles. It has a great thick outer material with a slip lining on the inside & a side zipper. Since I wore mine with tights, I did struggle with it slipping and rising up, so I had to pull it down after walking, but that’s the price I paid for getting a more fitted look. I’d recommend wearing a leotard-style top for a more tucked look, because my tucked in shirt under the skirt’s thicker material gave the illusion of extra belly that I don’t actually have from certain angles. Would still recommend!

I used the size chart to select my size. When I received product,  size is much much smaller than what's stated on chart.  Product is not for females who are curvy, and have hips or a developed backside.

Love love love this trend. It’s good fabric looks expensive not flimsy color is spot on and it’s really cozy. Fits perfect too. I’m 5’3and 115lbs and got an xs last time I got a small and it fits but need a belt to clinch it
I love this skirt! It fits perfectly and I received sooo many compliments. It washes well, zipper is fine and it’s great value for your money! Size small fit me perfectly!
This quality is excellent, and it fits great.
Small. No stretch or give. Too short. Uncomfortable at best.
Cute skirt, good quality, thick- runs big
I love this skirt and wouldn’t mind having it in all colors.
I am 26" waist and 34' hip and I got a medium however the waist is too big. It fits nicely. I would recommend
TTS. Good quality. But no stretch

The skirt is really well made. It’s so cute and perfect for both fall and winter. The fabric is thick and the pattern is pretty and does not look cheap. I ordered a medium and I think it fit true to size.

评论概述: YOU HAVE TO BE KIDDING ME.😡
评论详情: I ordered a skirt (Size M) in another color. Great quality. I actually loved it but it was just a little smaller than what I was expecting. So, I returned for a Size L. I got an XL cinched with a safety pin. Words cannot express how disappointed I am. Who actually thought this was acceptable?
This product ripped the second time I wore it. Many holes. Very cute for only one or two uses
Cute skirt. I just wish the sizes were accurate. Returned.
I’m in love with this skirt.  It’s so soft and cute.  The only problem is that they are made smaller than normal size.  Go one size up and it would be perfect.  I reordering a larger size.
I'm a size 12 waist and large wasn't even close to zipping up. Returning!
This skirt is great for the holidays or any winter event. Perfect fit and length. Not too tight or too loose. Pairs well with stockings and a tucked in shirt.
looks great on.  colors are perfect.  gave 4 stars because had just a little trouble with zipper. but ok now.
This is a gorgeous skirt with beautiful material however, it is not knee length as described. It’s more upper mid thigh and I am only 5’5.

评论概述: I don't know what my husband was thinking...
评论详情: I love plaid and I love blue but - polyester?  He said, there's some wool in it.  Some.  20%.  80% polyester. I DO NOT wear polyester and I did not need another skirt.
It was really cute just ran a little small so I had to return it :(

评论概述: SUPER CUTE AND FITS TRUE TO SIZE
评论详情: These are super cute skirts!! They come in a large variety of colors, and fit true to size. They are a medium weight material, kind of like a flannel material, so perfect with tights and boots for winter. You can also pair them with a pair of cute sandals and a tank top if you live in the south. Very comfortable. I purchased a size medium, and I am 5 ft tall, 135 pounds, Medium is my typical size. They are the perfect length without being too short or too long. I ordered them in 5 different colors. The red plaid is super cute for Christmas!

Fits as expected, fabric is not stretchy so make sure you pay attention to sizing measurements.  Love the style! I carry weight in my mid section and I feel like this does a great job of camouflaging it. Dress it up or down. Quality seems good for the price! Just bought a second color.
This skirt is so cute, but the quality is not good. An hour and a half into wearing it the side seam ripped. I am disappointed at how cheaply made this seems considering the price.
Not sure why this doesn’t bother people … but they couldn’t be bothered to have the pattern line up… looks AWFUL from the side
True to size and looks like the photo except the material is a fuzzy one, which I wasn’t expecting and couldn’t tell from the photo. Have not washed it yet.
I'm about to order another one because is so freaking cute! Wear thermal tights with this skirt! Definitely made for curvy women! Love it!
The material is wonderful. I received so many compliments. I ordered a small & felt like it may be a little small. I ordered a medium and it was way to big. I'm 5'5 140lb

评论概述: Beautiful Plaid But Doesn't Match At Seams
评论详情: I love this skirt but I'm not wearing it, it's just that it looks like fabric that my Grandma once gave me and I made a skirt like it back then! So it makes me smile when I see it. HOWEVER, like others said, the plaids do not match at the seams, but it's very pretty and soft.
I ordered an extra large to be on the safe side and it was a great fit with the length, it was so comfortable

I weight 120 and I’m 5’7 and got a small. It is a high waist skirt but I notice because my waist is so tiny it’s a little loose. I would like it tighter but it’s not horrible. Cute and fun with some thigh high boots.

This skirt is very cute, true to size, length is just right.  Unfortunately I had an event I bought it for and it didn’t arrive in time. I had an snag in the return process and the seller was very responsive and helpful in getting it resolved.
You need to be young and really skinny for this cutie. Bo one over 30 should wear

Im a medium size now, im 5.7” in between 135 140lb and I got medium and fits perfectly but I have small waist so like you can see on the pic on my waist area it’s a lil loose but nothing that I can’t fix hahahah im wearing that jacket for pics purposes. It’s comfy soft and beautiful, color is same as the original photo, zipper on the side and has good quality, it has the perfect height, not too short not too long. I love this skirt, never thought that amazon has cute things like this. Ps Also those boots are from amazon.
A medium actually fit me well. I am 5’5 160 pounds. I’d probably worry it was too short, but I plan on wearing with tights during the winter, so it’s perfect

I ordered my first one and loved it , I bought another one in a different color. I am 4 11 1/2 height. And it is short on me but, not to short. I wear black tights with the skirts it’s a perfect winter outfit. You can dress it up or down. Washes well. Material has very little give. Quality I like. I recommend the skirt.

I’m 5’8 & 145 ish. I ordered a large & it was too big. I thought going up a size would be better for tucking a sweater into the skirt but it’s still too big. I’ll be returning for a medium! Also the zipper gets stuck a little so just be cautious with that, but other than that I really like the material & look of this skirt.
Hermosa y de buena calidad

I loved this skirt and kept it as it fit well. Unfortunately, I just went to put it on to wear out and the patterns on the front and back do not line up!!  I hate I didn’t notice this when I originally tried it on. It’s too late to return so guess it’s going into the trash.  Make sure you 100% check this when you receive.
the squares were not matching, poor quality for the price , cheap materials, cute but expensive
Nice skirt, thick material. It lacks stretch. Love the color and pattern.

评论概述: A wonderful little skirt and it's lined which makes it all the better!
评论详情: Fits great! It's a good little skirt and for the price it's great!! I've bought several and love them all.
Love this skirt. Fits in all the right places. The length is perfect!

This skirt was true to size. It was a very flattering mid-thigh length with nice coverage in the back. The material is soft, and the skirt is lined. Pair it with a sweater vest for a super cute, preppy look.

The fit is perfect!! I’m  5’-7” and 140 lbs. ordered a medium.The fabric is so soft and comfortable. The quality is top notch.

Very nice skirts. Comfortable, soft material, true to size, it doesn’t ride up your thighs. I even got two. I’m 5’11 225 and I bought a Xl it fits snug. I could have bought a 2x which is my true size for a little wiggle room as well.
I’m 5’5” and 190. XL fits me perfectly. It is comfortable and I feel very cute in it. It’s my go to and I just ordered another color. The material is thick and does not feel cheap.
Very classy looking plaid skirt! Thick material with no stretch, so if you’re in between sizes, maybe go up one? Very excited to wear this out!!
Ran so much smaller and I got a size up!
This skirt is incredible. So cute, so comfortable, it’s perfect. I am obsessed with it!!
Wore to happy hour with a teddy bear coat same color Good quality I got an xl
Great mini skirt, well made. Not a ton of stretch on the waist but fits well in all the right places. I am short and it was slightly above knee but not too short. Definitely a mini skirt.

This skirt fit perfectly. It's not too short. I'm 5'3.  I received several very nice compliments on the skirt! I wore it on Christmas with a cute black sweater and black boots.  I like the skirt so much I even ordered another one today in a different color!  The only downside was that the zipper is broke, it will not go up or down.  Thankfully, I am able to just pull it up and down zipped to get it on. I only gave 4 stars instead of 5 because of the zipper issue.
Love, love, love this skirt. Ordered a large, I'm 5'8" 170lbs, tad big on the waist but preferred over being too tight. Great quality fabric!
What's the weather warms up this will look great

This skirt met all my expectations! The material is NOT cheap and it fit like a glove! I had many compliments at the Christmas Eve gathering! I’m in a size small and I’m 5’1” at 116lbs! You couldn’t purchase a better skirt and for the price it’s perfect!

This is so cute. I’ve worn it a few times. I can dress it up with a black body suit for the holidays or wear it with a white t shirt, a leather jacket and black boots for a more casual/cool look. I’m not sure how long it will last. I’d be delicate with it and lay it flat to try. I purchased a small and it fits perfectly.
I Love the quality and fit of the skirt! The sizing is true, I am a size 0 and the xs is a great fit for me!

The skirt is comfortable even though I use 2 layers under it, the color is as it is. The material is not stretchy. Zipper quality is fine. Lite fabric. It doesn’t shrink after wash. My waistline is 28”, my hips are 37”

评论概述: Make sure they don’t send you a used skirt!
评论详情: Ugh man idk what’s up with Amazon sending out used clothing but this is like the 4th time i’ve recieved used clothes, different companies, but the skirt i received that i just opened today to wear tomorrow, is most definitely used! It still has the tag on the inside but it WREAKS of perfume and had white cat (maybe dog) hair all over it! Tbh i wouldn’t even care that much but the smell of the perfume is so horrible i can’t keep it. Yes i could wash it but why did i pay full price for an item that is second hand technically? And yes the other person could have tried it on and decided not to wear if but they definitely 100% doused it in horrible perfume first! Size was too but anyways, I am 5’4 and 178 pounds, i got the XL but definitely need to size down to a LARGE, i am curvier but it was still way too big at the waist. I could pull it off but it just doesn’t look fitting like i wanted so i will definitely be returning and i hope they don’t send it out again! The skirt itself is really cute tho, decent material and i like the length. There’s a zipper side closure, no stretch tho. It’s a wool blend. Has thin lining inside but the skirt itself is thinner too but the wool blend makes it feel thicker. I needed this for Christmas and it’s tomorrow but i will probably re order it in a smaller size of LARGE, because it’s still cute for the winter season! Its giving Abercrombie but without the little shorts, which would be nice. I’m giving three stars because i am angry it smells so bad and i know it was used. Do better amazon.

It took a few tries of ordering and returning to get the size right (medium too large, xs too small). Small fit perfect! I’m 5’8, 132. The pink is just beautiful. Great quality, thick and soft inside. High waisted. Looks great!

The cutest skirt! Made well even lined ! Not to mention how soft it is! Not too short ! I highly recommend it! My new favorite skirt! I found the sizing perfect! I take a size4 so I got a small fits perfectly!
Fits well, is more of a fleecy fuzzy material than I originally thought.  Pattern doesn’t match up at seam (like many other reviews mention)  Overall comfortable, and fit for my general size.
This skirt is adorable, a little big in front but it looks fine

Product is true to size. I read other reviews, so I sized up. Wish I didnt. Super cute skirt, nice quality, great length and not too short. Can go good with many colors. I usually wear a size small, ordered a medium and it fell right off my hips. Ripped the tags off, so had to give it away. Will order again in my actual size.

评论概述: Cute skirt but sizing is off
评论详情: I ordered a large which fits in the waist, but is way too big through the hips where it’s just not very flattering.

This skirt is super cute and comfy. I’m 5’4 195lbs and got a size Large . I should have got a Medium because it’s big around the waist but I don’t think it would have fit over my hips. Definitely will be ordering more!

Love the style! There is just a big difference in the small and medium sizes. I got a small and it fits, but a teeny bit too snug, so I got a medium and it was huge! A small and half would fit perfect lol. I still kept the small because I love the way it looks!

评论概述: Prints don’t line up front and back
评论详情: I wanted to like this so bad but I just can’t get over the plaids not lining up at the seem. If it was a little off it’d be different but once I saw it in the mirror I couldn’t unsee it. The fabric and overall quality are great. Not too thick and lined underneath so it’s not see through. I ordered a large. I’m 5”1/160 and 6mo Postpartum so I still have a bit of a tummy. It’s was too big in the hips but fit perfectly in the waist.
Such a cute skirt! So much so I've bought four of them in different colors/patterns! Great quality for a great price!
Fun and soft but the plaid does not line up, so this is not a rich looking piece. Stitching is meh and fabric flimsy. But it's cute and fun, probably for one or two seasons tops.

Got this for a trip to Paris, it’s a pretty thick material and I wore it with fleece lined tights. It’s not stretchy at all, so make sure you get the right size, I like my clothes on the tighter side so since it’s not stretchy it’s more of a standing skirt since sitting can be slightly uncomfortable.  As far as washing I just throw it in the washing machine with everything, then hang to dry. Overall I love this skirt, I have it in 3 colors. I’m 5’4” and 135lbs just for reference.
I really like this skirt. The fabric feels like a sweater. It fits really nice. Not too tight or loose.

评论概述: Awesome!! Looks great!! I will be buying other colors
评论详情: Looks great!! I will be buying other colors
True to size and long enough

I wear a size 2 at most clothing stores (i.e. old navy, american eagle), and this skirt in a size small was too big by about 3-4in in the waist. The waist fit my hips, but then looked too long and not flattering. Had the skirt been more elastic, it would fit a larger range of people. But instead, it is a stiff, cheaper feeling material. Find a better $30 skirt elsewhere :)
I'm pleasantly surprised with the quality of the material. It's not a cheap skirt you'll only wear once. It fits really nice and is comfortable to wear. Def buy!
I am 5’4” 160lbs and the M fit perfectly! It’s super cute just like pictured. The zipper looks like it will hold up. It opened and closed easily.
The material is amazing! I purchased the xs and it fits like a small.

I've said it before, but saying it again... WHY is the word "women's" been added to the descriptions? That means extra room in the hips and for tops, extra room in the shoulder back area. We aren't ALL in need of that extra room. get with it Amazon!!!!
Print was good, material was ok but absolutely no stretch. Made my mid section more bigger, returned it
Nice skirt but I’m a solid medium and I couldn’t zip this skirt. Too small. 5’7” - 150lbs
Love the skirt but it runs small so I would size up!
The skirt is a little short but overall great quality materials
Good quality but runs large. I got a medium. I am returning for a small

Ok, so I scavenged reviews for all of the plaid skirts. That's how I selected this.  I'm just shy of 5' 7" and about 180. I carry my weight pretty evenly but definitely have a tummy. I was hesitant to even try a short skirt but I wanted it for a holiday party.  The waist wasn't tight. I thought it would be bc it is a zip up dress with no elastic or stretch feel to it. As someone who would wear a size smaller except due to her waist, the waist is usually why I have to return things. But this skirt was comfy, even through all of date night.
Beautiful, very well made, and high quality. Exceeded my expectations. The fit was perfect for my daughter and the material and material thickness are both perfect. It looks exactly like the photos.

I love this skirt! It is so cute and flattering. The sizing of this skirt is off however. I am a size 8 normally so originally ordered a medium, and I was swimming in it. Had to exchange it for a small and it fit perfectly. There is no stretch with this skirt so be mindful. The fabric is thick and double lined which is a plus. It compliments my figure very well. For reference  , I am 5'6, weigh 155 lbs and am a 29-30 in waisted and 40-41 in hips.
Was excited for this skirt. Got an XL which is what I usually wear. Didn’t fit. It wouldn’t even zip up at all. 😞
Well constructed. Sizing was a little on the larger side. Had to return as it was just weird fabric

If you have time to spend figuring out the sizing this can be a great skirt. Based on other reviews talking about it being hard to sit, I sized up. Big mistake because the skirt is just a bit too loose. I think if I’d gotten a size smaller there’d surely have been space to sit comfortably. While yes, there isn’t much stretch, for me at least the skirt is structured well enough to accommodate sitting. I like the skirt but don’t think I have time to return it and try a new size so I’ll have to get it taken in. Wish I could say I loved it but size is always a sticking point.
